results.title: Comparison of the Ameliorating Effects of Valsartan and Amlodipine on Vascular Endothelial Dysfunction and Oxidative Stress in Elderly Patients with Type H Hypertension
results.text_hl: @CHEMICAL_Valsartan @CHEMICAL_MESH:D000068756 @@@Valsartan@@@ was better than @<m>CHEMICAL_Amlodipine</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D017311 @@@amlodipine@@@ in improving @<m>DISEASE_Vascular_Diseases</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D014652 @@@vascular endothelial dysfunction@@@ and oxidative stress levels.

results.title: The effectiveness of combinated antihypertensive treatment in patients with essential hypertension of the ii-nd stage depending on the type of daily blood pressure profile and the type of remodelling of the left ventricle.
results.text_hl: With impossibility of BP lowering to the target level, @<m>CHEMICAL_Amlodipine</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D017311 @@@amlodipine@@@ has been added.

results.title: Synergistic effect of amlodipine and atorvastatin in reversing LDL-induced endothelial dysfunction.

results.title: Amlodipine ameliorates endothelial dysfunction in mesenteric arteries from spontaneously hypertensive rats.

results.title: [The Possibilities of Pharmacological Correction of Endothelial Dysfunction in Patients With Arterial Hypertension].
results.text_hl: OBJECTIVE: To assess the possibility of a fixed combination of perindopril arginine and @<m>CHEMICAL_Amlodipine</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D017311 @@@amlodipine@@@ in the correction of @<m>DISEASE_Vascular_Diseases</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D014652 @@@endothelial dysfunction@@@ (@<m>DISEASE_Vascular_Diseases</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D014652 @@@ED@@@) in @SPECIES_9606 @@@patients@@@ with @DISEASE_Pulmonary_Arterial_Hypertension @DISEASE_MESH:D000081029 @@@arterial hypertension@@@ (@DISEASE_Pulmonary_Arterial_Hypertension @DISEASE_MESH:D000081029 @@@AH@@@).

results.title: S-amlodipine improves endothelial dysfunction via the RANK/RANKL/OPG system by regulating microRNA-155 in hypertension.

results.title: Amlodipine improves endothelial function and metabolic parameters in patients with hypertension.
results.text_hl: We hypothesized that @<m>CHEMICAL_Amlodipine</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D017311 @@@amlodipine@@@ therapy in @DISEASE_Hypertension @DISEASE_MESH:D006973 @@@hypertensive@@@ subjects will improve @<m>DISEASE_Vascular_Diseases</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D014652 @@@endothelial dysfunction@@@ and metabolic parameters.

results.title: [Correction of endothelial dysfunction in hypertensive patients with type 2 diabetes mellitus during combined antihypertensive therapy].
results.text_hl: AIM: To evaluate the impact of 6-month antihypertensive therapy with the combined drug @<m>CHEMICAL_Amlodipine</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D017311 @@@amlodipine@@@ + @CHEMICAL_Lisinopril @CHEMICAL_MESH:D017706 @@@lisinopril@@@ (ekvator) on @<m>DISEASE_Vascular_Diseases</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D014652 @@@endothelial dysfunction@@@ (@<m>DISEASE_Vascular_Diseases</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D014652 @@@ED@@@) and @CHEMICAL_Carbohydrates @CHEMICAL_MESH:D002241 @@@carbohydrate@@@ metabolic parameters in @SPECIES_9606 @@@patients@@@ with @DISEASE_Hypertension @DISEASE_MESH:D006973 @@@hypertension@@@ and @DISEASE_Diabetes_Mellitus_Type_2 @DISEASE_MESH:D003924 @@@type 2 diabetes mellitus@@@ (@DISEASE_Diabetes_Mellitus @DISEASE_MESH:D003920 @@@DM@@@).

results.title: Olmesartan Combined With Amlodipine on Oxidative Stress Parameters in Type 2 Diabetics, Compared With Single Therapies
results.text_hl: To evaluate the effects of a fixed combination of @CHEMICAL_olmesartan @CHEMICAL_MESH:C437965 @@@olmesartan@@@/@<m>CHEMICAL_Amlodipine</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D017311 @@@amlodipine@@@ compared with @CHEMICAL_olmesartan @CHEMICAL_MESH:C437965 @@@olmesartan@@@ or @<m>CHEMICAL_Amlodipine</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D017311 @@@amlodipine@@@ alone on some parameters of @<m>DISEASE_Vascular_Diseases</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D014652 @@@endothelial damage@@@ in @DISEASE_Diabetes_Mellitus @DISEASE_MESH:D003920 @@@diabetic@@@, @DISEASE_Hypertension @DISEASE_MESH:D006973 @@@hypertensive@@@ @SPECIES_9606 @@@patients@@@.
